long_desc: Opt for an androgynous look this season with the Manila loafer by Stuart Weitzman. Crafted from smooth leather, this masculine-inspired shoe features tassel detailing to the vamp and a chunky cleated sole. Wear with tailored separates or off-duty staples for a sophisticated finish to both smart and casual ensembles.

long_desc: A foundation-and-concealer in one for a natural, beyond perfected look that lasts all day. Lightweight, moisturising make-up covers thoroughly without clogging pores. Skin breathes comfortably and colour stays true, even through sweat and humidity.

long_desc: Ideal for laid back days, these joggers from Givenchy are built with an elasticated waist for superior comfort. Simply decorated with a sports stripe down the side, the durable cotton composition ensures a smooth feel. Simply pair with a tee and sneakers on off-duty days.

long_desc: Just as the wax honeycomb in which a bee stores their honey has inspired countless architects and artists, so the mesmerising structure inspires the Lalique Rayons design. long_desc: Ladylike style comes courtesy of the Dolce & Gabbana Rosa pumps. Crafted in beautiful floral lace, the shoes are cut low in the front for a leg-lengthening effect, while the pointed toe is embellished with a crystal brooch. Designed in a mid-height, these elegant shoes will bring a timeless sensibility to party looks.

long_desc: Add elegance to evenings with this Alice + Olivia printed ball gown skirt. The maxi features a dark, yet charming forest print, filled with rich flowers and fanciful birds. long_desc: Paige Denim updates its signature ultra-skinny Verdugo in soft leather with just the right amount of stretch for a comfortable fit. Featuring a classic 5-pocket style, these ankle-grazing trousers sculpt the body through the leg for a lean silhouette. Endlessly versatile, the buttery leather Verdugo trousers take your look seamlessly from day to night.

long_desc: Magnanni's fine craftsmanship is effortlessly translated from dress shoe to sneaker. These smart shoes are a contemporary uptake on the brand's wholecut Oxford. Traditionally cut from a single stretch of smooth leather, the modernised  upper features a contrasting textured leather panel across the middle of the shoe. Styled simply with neat Oxford lacing and a rubber-reinforced leather sole, this burnish-tanned pair are perfect with slim cut suits for a dapper finish.
tags: Harrods Stripe Mix Wholecut Magnanni's fine craftsmanship is effortlessly translated from dress shoe to sneaker. These smart shoes are a contemporary uptake on the brand's wholecut Oxford. Traditionally cut from a single stretch of smooth leather, the modernised  upper features a contrasting textured leather panel across the middle of the shoe. Styled simply with neat Oxford lacing and a rubber-reinforced leather sole, this burnish-tanned pair are perfect with slim cut suits for a dapper finish.

short_desc: Suede and Leather Double Monk Shoe
long_desc: Featuring dapper wingtip styling and a double buckle monk strap fastening, this premium shoe from Magnanni is expertly crafted in smooth leather with supple suede panelling for an eclectic finish. Finished with stylish punch hole detailing, this sharply styled design will perfectly complement business tailoring.
